column5: Waterwheel J-203 is sure to please and meet all your vacation needs! A spacious 3 bedroom/2 bath condo that offers all the comforts of home with astounding courtyard views and easy access to the Guadalupe River, Comal River, Schlitterbahn, Downtown NB, and Gruene.
column8: Vacationers Paradise in the Heart of New Braunfels - Waterwheel J-203
